summary: In future Japan, a dangerous pollen falls upon Tokyo, endangering its populace. Two people volunteer to become tests subject for a drug that could possibly provide a cure.
cast: Shinji Aoyama|Shirô Atami|Shingo Ichizawa|Kazushige Inami|Takeshi Ishizumi|Yûichirô Izumi|Shunpei Kawaguchi|Taeko Kobayashi|Reiko Kondo|Yae Konishi|Masamichi Matsumoto|Shôgo Motomiya|Yôko Muranushi|Miki Nakata|Yôko Oguchi|Akiko Okuda|Atsuko Sano|Atsushi Shibano|Kenichi Shimizu|Dai Soma|Tarô Suwa|Akihiro Suzuki|Miako Tadano|Shinji Takeda|Jirô Taniguchi|Takashi Urai|Hiroyuki Yamaguchi|Naoki Yamamoto|Yutaka Yasui|Akira Yoshino

title: Ôinaru gen'ei
